attributes.action: Impliment stronger laws and mandatory sentencing for those carrying knives and other weapons that are capable of causing serious injury or death.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call for swift and strong sentencing for any persons found to be armed on our streets and would like to present our suggestions on presentaion of the petition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
